title: Robert Slimbach
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Robert Slimbach**

Robert Slimbach (1956-) is the award-winning designer of many typefaces. He started his career in the early 1980s with Autologic. He then did freelance type design for a couple of years, producing ITC Slimbach and ITC Giovanni. All his work since then has been for [Adobe Systems](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe%20Systems). A brief biographical article about Slimbach can be found from the [Adobe website.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/typedesign/slimbach.html)

Among his designs are:  
Adobe Garamond [Premier Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1737.html) and [Premier Pro Opticals](http://web.archive.org/)  
 [Caflisch Script Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1725.html)  
 [ITC Giovanni Std](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1062.html)  
 [ITC Slimbach Std](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1081.html)  
Adobe Kepler [Text](http://web.archive.org/) and [Opticals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1431.html)  
 [Adobe Myriad Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1706.html)  
 [Adobe Poetica Std](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1439.html)  
Adobe Sanvito Pro [Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1730.html) and [Opticals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1731.html)  
Adobe Utopia Std [Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1414.html) and [Opticals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1415.html)  
Adobe Warnock Pro [Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1709.html) and [Opticals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1710.html)  
Adobe Jenson Pro [Text](http://web.archive.org/) and [Opticals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1716.html)  
Cronos [Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1733.html) and [Opticals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1734.html)  
Adobe Brioso Pro [Text](http://web.archive.org/), [Opticals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1504.html) and [Poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202174556/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1505.html)
